input: I supply services, mostly to clients in Maharashtra.
output: Since you supply services inter-state (Karnataka to Maharashtra), GST registration is mandatory regardless of your ₹30 lakh turnover, as per Section 24 of the CGST Act. You’ll need to charge IGST (e.g., 18% for most services) and file GSTR-1 and GSTR-3B. Steps: Visit gst.gov.in, fill GST REG-01, upload PAN, Aadhaar, and bank details, and obtain GSTIN within 7 days. Need help with the registration process?
